mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.user_name, b.status_nm FROM user_info a LEFT OUTER JOIN employee_status b on b.status = a.user_status WHERE shop_id = #{_shopId} AND user_id != #{_userId} AND a.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY a.created_dt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee_info ( id, shop_id, employee_code, jumin_num, address1, address2, user_status, phone_number, comments, account_num, created_id, created_dt, modified_id, modified_dt ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{_shopId}, #{employeeCode}, #{enc_jumin}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{status}, #{enc_tel}, #{comments}, #{accountNum}, #{_userId}, now(), #{_userId}, now() )
